page.title: 05Our Farm Visit.
page.content: We went on our visit on 12th June It was wet and windy It was a mixed farm There were 260 acres altogether Six workmen help the farmer He has 60-100 beef cattle,70 sheep and 125 lambs In the barns there are 2 tractors,1 hay cart,1 truck and 5 implements He grows oil seed rape,grass for silage or hay,barley, wheat,potatoes and turnips for the sheep in winter. SHEEP SHEARING I went to Mr. Horsefield's farm and the second time we went to Mr. Horsefield's farm we saw the sheep The sheep were being sheared and Timothy Walker had a watch He timed the shearing It took 3 minutes a sheep.
